item.title: Starter Command Help please :(
item.dc:creator: @Skillz4me Skillz4me
item.description:
@Skillz4me wrote:

    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) {   
        if (starter == 0) {
            addItem(995, 15000000);
            addItem(392, 15000);                           
            sendMessage("Project-enjoi Starter Package");
            starter = 1;
            savemoreinfo( );
            savechar( );
        } else if (starter == 2) {
            sendMessage("Bad luck");
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
                    + " Is a fucker and is a greedy bitch!! :p");

        }
